poem.title: from Tantris, part 1
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Tantris MacDuff?
   - That'll do... am I no deid yet?
or are you St Boutros?
- No, I'm Doctor Smee;
now tell me, Tantris...
- First name terms already?
That's odd, I don't remember swiving you.
Here, give me a sick line, pal, I need
	the best specialist in town.
